full_output.summary: Recent graduate with an ongoing degree in Information Technology, with a solid foundation in full-stack development, eager to apply software engineering skills to deliver innovative solutions. Proficient in front-end and back-end technologies, with a strong understanding of responsive web design and database management. Committed to collaborating with teams and expanding knowledge in a professional setting.

projects.name: E-commerce Web Application
projects.description: Developed an e-commerce platform using Python and Django to facilitate online transactions. Implemented user authentication and authorization features to ensure secure user access and data protection.

projects.name: Chat Application
projects.description: Developed a chat application using Python and Django to facilitate chatting online Implemented chat room functionalities, allowing users to create, join, and manage chat rooms.

experiences.description: Completed an internship in Python development under the guidance of my mentor. Engineered a visual dashboard with both front-end and back-end (API) using Python, Django, chart.js, SQLite, and Bootstrap.

full_output.name: ASSA SINGH
achievements_and_awards: Participated as a contestant in the Delhi Kickboxing Championship at the state level and won a silver medal there.
